body:
## Expected Behavior

As stated here - https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/tree/master/tools/sql - adding `-y` command should not run - rather perform dry-run.

## Actual Behavior

schema migration happens

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. `./temporal-sql-tool --ep $SQL_HOST -p $SQL_PORT --plugin postgres --db temporal_visibility update-schema -d ./schema/postgresql/v96/temporal/versioned -v 1.3 -y`

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7813457/104824564-b86e6980-584a-11eb-92a3-09bf58ebf0d4.png)

## Specifications

  - Version: v1.5.1
  - Platform: Mac
title: temporal-sql-tool dry-run not working
